name: Password.NET
short_description:
One free, open source, and portable program to handle all of your passwords. If you have multiple computers, just put these files inside your Dropbox account, and your passwords will be available wherever you need them.

You can also use Password.NET to store web page's URLs, so you will never miss your favorite sites.

The app features a simple To Do list.

Your personal information is safe on Password.NET. It uses its own encryption library, so no programs have been made to break it.

Now you can use Password.NET on many other platforms (Mac, Linux, BSD, Solaris, etc), through the use of Mono framework.

HELP WANTED: I'd like to have the program translated to other languages. If you want to help, take a look at the files inside "lang" folder. Creating a new language file is pretty easy!! Just open a support ticket if you have any questions.

There are only 54 phrases that need translation.
summary: Very simple and portable password management program and To Do list
